name: White Cotton T-Shirt
description: This contoured, classic cut T-shirt has that flattering style that's sure to turn some heads. It's great for layering under a sweater or sweatshirt and even better by itself with a pair of jeans. It's a good idea to own this one in a few different colors; it's definitely a go-to item.

name: Light Blue T-Shirt
description: This premium T-shirt is as close to perfect as can be. Soft, comfortable and durable, this is a definite must-own.

name: Green T-Shirt
description: This T-Shirt is as perfect as perfect gets: it's soft yet stretchy, a little longer than a standard tee and figure-flattering. 100% cotton Double-stitched ribbed collar and hems.

name: Ribbed polo-Neck Jumper
description: Boxy-style, long-sleeved jumper in a rib knit containing some wool. Polo neck with large metal and imitation pearl buttons, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

name: Oversized Shirt Jacket
description: Straight cut shirt jacket in sturdy, washed denim. Features a pointed collar and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with button cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist and a rounded hem.

name: Leather Jacket
description: Sleek in silhouette with a a double-ended zip, the allie leather jacket is a modern riff on a wardrobe hero. It s designed using a butter-soft leather and is fully lined for comfort, but will lend any off-duty look a tough-luxe edge. Collarless neckline. Zip pocket to each hip. Slim fitting.
